subject: Football
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Keenum, injured late in Sunday’s loss at Baltimore when the back of his helmet banged into the turf after a hit, was at Rams Park studying film and participating in meetings Tuesday.
snippet: Keenum, injured late in Sunday’s loss at Baltimore when the back of his helmet banged into the turf after a hit, was at Rams Park studying film and participating in meetings Tuesday.
